com.parkingtycoon.controllers

Class TimeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.BaseController
      • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.UpdatableController
        • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.TimeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable

    public class TimeController
extends UpdatableController
    This Class is responsible for enabling Controllers to be called every time when a amount of in game time has passes.
    Author:
    Timo Strating

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Advance the time every update

      • advanceTime

        private void advanceTime()
        update all time counters and notify registers if a specific amount of time has passed.

      • registerTimedUpdatable

        public void registerTimedUpdatable(TimedUpdatable updatable,
                                   TimeController.TimeUpdate atTime)
        Register a TimeUpdatable as a item that would like te be updated.
        Parameters:
        updatable - The class that would like to receive the update at a specific in game time.
        atTime - the in game time frames between the updates.

      • unregisterTimedUpdatable

        public boolean unregisterTimedUpdatable(TimedUpdatable updatable,
                                        TimeController.TimeUpdate atTime)
        UnRegister a TimeUpdatable as a item that would like te be updated.
        Parameters:
        updatable - The class that would like to stop receiving the update at a specific in game time.
        atTime - the in game time frames between the updates.

      • getDelegate

        private Delegate<TimedUpdatable> getDelegate(TimeController.TimeUpdate atTime)
        This is a helper methode that selects the Delegate that is used for a specific time frame.
        Parameters:
        atTime - the TimeFrame for witch you search a delegate.
        Returns:
        Te found delegate.
